name: E-commerce Platform Project
quote: Developed a comprehensive e-commerce platform with user authentication, payment gateway integration, inventory management, and responsive design. Features include shopping cart, order tracking, and admin dashboard.

name: To-Do List Mobile App
quote: Developed a simple and intuitive to-do list application with task management, reminders, categories, and offline sync. Features include clean UI, task prioritization, and cross-device synchronization.

name: SEO & Digital Marketing Campaign
quote: Implemented comprehensive SEO strategy with keyword optimization, content marketing, Google Ads campaigns, and social media management. Achieved 250% increase in organic traffic and improved search rankings.

name: 3D Adventure RPG Game
quote: Created an immersive 3D RPG game using Unity with custom character systems, inventory management, quest mechanics, and multiplayer functionality. Features stunning graphics and smooth gameplay mechanics.

name: Data Processing Automation
quote: Developed automated data processing system using Python, Selenium, and BeautifulSoup. Processes thousands of records daily with 99.9% accuracy, saving 40+ hours per week of manual work.

name: SaaS Dashboard Platform
quote: Built a comprehensive SaaS dashboard with user management, analytics, subscription handling, and real-time data visualization. Features include role-based access control, API integrations, and responsive design.
